author: Stephanie Bedard-Chateauneuf
title: Coronavirus Just Took Another Victim… Corona Beer
description: Corona beer is another victim of coronavirus, as a decision from the Mexican government is forcing the brewer to suspend beer production. The post Coronavirus Just Took Another Victim… Corona Beer appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Starting on Sunday, Grupo Modelo will no longer produce Corona beer.
  • The Mexican government declared that beer production isnt an essential activity during the coronavirus pandemic.
  • This decision will hit the Corona brewer and other Me… [+2994 chars]
